pages.text: The $(item)Solderer$() is a machine that can make various $(thing)Circuits$(), which are needed for more advanced machines. It requires too much temperature for a mere $(item)Magmatic Aeroheater$() to fuel it.$(br2)To make a $(thing)Circuit$(), the machine needs $(item)Circuit Plates$(), $(item)Gold Dust$() and an appropriate $(thing)Circuit Pattern$(). The latter will tell which $(thing)Circuit$() will be made.

The time spent and the amount of $(thing)Gold$() needed depends on the $(thing)Circuit$() made, and some of them will need an additional item to be consumed.$(br2)The machine needs to melt inserted $(item)Gold Dust$() before being able to use it, which it will do once hot enough.
All items will be automatically put in the correct slots when shift clicked or inserted through automation.$(br2)Items can be inserted/extracted from any side except the top and bottom.
